function add(num1) {
  return function sum(num2) {
    return num1 + num2;
  };
}

const addOne = add(1); // sum(1,num2)
const addTwo = add(2); // sum(2,num2)

function sum1(num1, num2) {
  return num1 + num2;
}

function mul1(num1, num2) {

}

function log(value) {
  return function (fn) {
    fn(value);
  };
}

const logFoo = log("foo");

logFoo((v) => console.log(v));
logFoo((v) => console.info(v));
logFoo((v) => console.error(v));
logFoo((v) => console.warn(v));

  return typeof value === type;
}

};

};

// Closure ì‚¬ìš©

    return typeof value === type;
  };

arr.filter(isString2); // ['A','B','C']

function fetcher(endpoint) {
  return function (url, options) {
    return fetch(endpoint + url, options)
      .then((res) => {
        if (res.ok) {
          return res.json();
        } else {
          throw new Error(res.error);
        }
      })
      .catch((err) => console.error(err));
  };
}

const naverApi = fetcher("http://naver.com/");
const daumApi = fetcher("http://daum.net/");

naverApi("/webtoon").then((res) => res);
daumApi("/webtoon").then((res) => res);

function createCarousel(options) {
  var options = options || {};
  var margin = options.margin || 0;
  var center = options.center || false;
  var navElement = options.navElement || "div";

  return {
    margin,
    center,
    navElement,
  };
}

// ê°ì²´ êµ¬ì¡° ë¶„í•´ ì´ìš©

  margin = 0,
  center = false,
  navElement = "div",
} = {}) {

    margin,
    center,
    navElement,
  };
}
createCarousel(); // default value
createCarousel2(); // default value

const required = (argName) => {
  throw new Error("required is " + argName);
};
function createCarousel({
  items = required("items"),
  margin = 0,
  center = false,
  navElement = "div",
} = {}) {
  return {
    margin,
    center,
    navElement,
  };
}

const price = ["2000", "3000", "4000", "1000", "5000"];

function getWonPrice(priceList) {

  for (let i = 0; i < priceList.length; i++) {
    temp.push(priceList[i] + "ì›");

    it+'ì›'

const price = ["2000", "3000", "4000", "1000", "5000"];

const suffixWon = (price) => price + "ì›";
const isOverOneThousand = (price) => Number(price) > 1000;

function getWonPrice(priceList) {
  const isOverList = priceList.filter(isOverOneThousand);
  return isOverList.map(suffixWon);
}

const price = ["2000", "3000", "4000", "1000", "5000"];

const suffixWon = (price) => price + "ì›";

const ascendingList = (a, b) => a - b;
function getWonPrice(priceList) {
  const isOverList = priceList.filter(isOverOneThousand);
  const sortList = isOverList.sort(ascendingList);
  return isOverList.map(suffixWon);
}

const result = getWonPrice(price);
